headline: Regeneron cancer bispecific rejected again; Allogene discloses trial death
summary: The FDA issued a complete response letter for Regeneron's lymphoma drug odronextamab. Elsewhere, Bristol Myers raised its guidance and analysts saw progress in Biogen’s turnaround.
